choices: Tonight, conversation at the restaurant, 5'7.75"
Monday morning at the office, 5'6.5".
Fast forward a month, you've become the runt of the office, 4'7".
Fast forward a week, you're at the doctors, 5'4.5".
ast forward a year, Kate's hosting a girls night, you're 5". *
1.content:
4:55pm Friday, time to pack up your things, log off your workstation, and get out of work. The only thing is to leave *around* your boss, Mrs. Laney, so she won't get on to you for leaving technically early. As you put on your coat and stand up, you realize, your clothes seem ever so slightly looser than they did in the morning, but you don't think anything of it; the important thing is to skirt the old taskmaster. Heh, old, she's only 30, but she got to be manager fairly early by that hard-driving, take no prisoners work ethic.

Laney is on the phone with a customer, great. Your account logged off, you grab your bag, leave your cubicle, and walk around the other side of the cube bank. "See you Monday Ron" the smoking hot receptionist Laura says on your way out. She's another Laney-type, dark hair, brown eyes, svelte body and the instincts of a killer, but she's just a receptionist since she's only 19. You'd talked with her a little about why she chose to go right into work instead of the more traditional route of dicking around a few years in college, maybe learning something, but, she seemed to know what she was doing.

Fortunately not everyone in the office was a shark. On your way out you gave a wink or air five to Helen and Scott, both in their late thirties, whom you'd talked with about going to get drinks tomorrow night. Tonight, though, it was all about a hot date with Kate. You'd gotten reservations at a three star restaurant and were going to show her a very, very good time. It was kind of hard with the two of you working different hours most of the week, you'd just come home, eat, welcome her in late, and go to bed, but you both had Saturdays off so Friday was the traditional date night.

Kate, whom you'd been going out with for almost a year and living with for a couple months, was 5'5" and curvy, with a very light complexion, and dyed blonde hair. She worked evenings at a fashionable clothing store and so usually wore flats with whatever was current and within dress code.
1.title: Is something off?

choices: Tomorrow , Kate didn't realize your shrinking 5'6"
Tonight , Kate see you are smaller
Skip 3 days later , announce you are shrinking at your office
Skip one week later Laurene got the promotion
Skip two weeks later your colleagues know stress enhance your shrinking
12.content:
You've been throught a really harsh and puzzling Week-end .

When you went at restaurant last day you barely ate something .You thought you had caught a weird desease and even wondered if it was affecting your mind as everyone seemed slightly taller and everything bigger . Kate didn't tell you but she also saw a slight change meant in your height.

You had however to stop thinking of it and focus on the day coming. You parked you car and when you got out of it you faced the only person you wanted not to see , Lauren .
"Good morning Ron " she said with her too usual superior tone
"Hi..." you briefly answered with a fake smile on your face .
Lauren was kind of the office jerk , she was competiting with you at work as your boss announced she will give a promotion to one of you. On the contrary of her you were not too much attracted by money , you just didn't want to offer this bitch a chance to boss you around as she will get higher responsibility in the enterprise .

The both of you walked along heading to the office and you noticed that she was clearly slightly taller than you . You were a bit surprised by this as she usually were you size with her heels on .
Lauren was 5'6" tall without any heels on . You looked at her shoes and saw that it wasn't new shoes , in fact you remembered she wore it ( you sometimes stared at her dangling her shoes while working )

The two of you were one of the first in here and you both go to work on your respective computer .
After several minutes you glance at her and seing her deep in her work made you lose willness and you yawned .
Just at this moment Laney came in and looked at you with a quizzical eye .

"Shit" you thought before launching you back on your computer
"Good morning everyone " "Good Morning " Laurene answered cheerfully , happy this whole scene happened .
You also shyly welcomed her while focusing back on your work .

During the break you stayed with Scott Helen and a few other colleagues, noticing they also seemed a bit taller than usual .
You asked Helen to come with you and when you only were the two of you you asked her if you looked smaller than before , she just laughed at you at first then was a bit doubting when you told her your usual height
"hmm are you sure you are that height ? My husband is this size but I'm kind of sure he his taller than you..."

What she told you puzzled you for the whole day , were you shrinking ? It was impossible ! And what will happen to you if you shrink ?'
12.title: Monday morning at the office, 5'6.5".

choices: That night Company gym 4'11'
An ok week of working under Laurene 4'6"
A bad week under Laurene 4'2"
124.content:
It was a hard week for you. almost every task you had seemed to go worse then it should and with that happening Laurene spent the week practically on fire. You continued to shrink during the week almost feeling like every victory Laurene got over you made you smaller. When you saw her this morning coming in at the same time that you do you hide around the corner so because when she noticed your size about three days ago she has been doing daily size comparisons as a confidence boost. You know you were 5'3" last time she compared to you but, you avoided her yesterday so she probably had at least 4" on you now. When you walk in you see that Laurene went straight into Laney's office. You feel a sinking feeling in your stomach and practically feel a shrinking confidence. You get started on you work but, soon get called into Mrs. Laney's office. Laurene holds the door for you and smiles as she sees that you now 5' now a head smaller then her in today's heels.

Mrs. Laney starts, "Well Ron as you know the promotion was up for grabs for both of you and you really dropped the ball." looking directly at you. "Laurene on the other hand has just set the company record for sales in a week. So clearly you both know who I would choose for the promotion but, the higher ups have called and offered Laurene a job upstairs. The reason your in here Ron was going to be so I can fire you but then Laurene considers you a bit of a good luck charm so you will be moved with her as a personal assistant."

The meeting ends with both of you being told to box up your desks to move which you spend the rest of the day doing. Towards the end of the day Laurene comes up to you and pats the top of your head. "You excited to start work as my assistant little boy," She asks. You try to shrug her off but then she says. "Hey you were going to get fired today if it wasn't for me so you better come tomorrow knowing I'm why you still work here.
124.title: Laurene gets the promotion, and an assistant

choices: Your girlfriend comes back while your are cleaning the shoes
Your girlfriend comes back at 2 am and drunk
3 days later, you can't pay the rent this month, your girlfriend has left 4'1.
1243.content:
Working for Laurene allowed you to pay the rent , even if you were demoted to PA you managed to deal with Laurene after a tough discution to keep two third of your previous salary, that basically made you at 995$ a mounth.



Well the cut of your salary has a bit bothered you recently, the problem was it was affecting your life at home with your girlfriend.

Kate only began working this year as an ingeneer but she already made a bit more than twice your salary... That plus the fact you saw in her letter this morning that she had a new offer for a way better paid job in town it made you ashamed of yourself and felt a bit dependant. As you came back later and later because of "work"
she more and more slept or was missing when you came home , or even if she was here it felt a bit awkward to try to talk and she basically seemed to be even more disappointed by you as she saw you were even smaller.

You had tried to keep her happy but Lauren has been exploiting you every days , bossing you around, What was bound to happen happened and with the incrementing amount of hours of work plus the stress making you unable to properly sleep at night made you make a mistake so huge that the whole sector lost the entire day fixing it.

Oh if you were afraid of Laurene, seeing her in fury, belittling you and your incompetence in front of the whole office made you fear her ten times more.

Skipping back home , you were home earlier. You went back home at 19:00 but your wife wasn't here. No notes and no SMS answer. Kate had also told you not to call her and just send her text cause it annoyed her to be "spammed".


Well at least it was greatly timed , After multiple begs Laurene offered you to clean around twenty pair of shoes she had, you praid for your girlfriend not to come too early and have enough time to make them perfect , Laurene warned you if you even failed that after you lmistake at work you could say goodbye to your job.
1243.title: A bad week under Laurene 4'2"

choices: 4'0" You couldn't bring Laurene's shoes
1 day later, a man you know is at your place topless
12432.content:
You were relieved at first , it took you two hours to completely clean the shoes , you were a bit stressed by the idea you couldn't remove the dirty print of her sole in some insoles of the shoes but you tried everything , sponge , clothes , even your own toothbrush , wished seemed, when rubbed against soap revealed to be efficient.

You had found an area under the bed where you could hide the bags ( there were a lot of shoes) . The bed was in a huge bedroom of the flat ,there also was a balcony , a bathroom a kitchen and a restroom, a really beautifull full equipeped design house rented 1100$ a mounth. Unfortunately too much to you now. It was a bit difficult to undergo because if you hadn't fail to get promoted and demoted instead, you wouldn't have been this embarrassed.

You were used to your girlfriend taking some distances lately , you understand her as she has a lot of work and do it at home sometimes . You disliked even if she didn't introduced you to him the guy she named "Tom ".

At beginning a few weeks ago you remembered she received an invitation on facebook ,Tom" something" she asked you if you knew him you said no, you even joked by saying she should accept him. she apparently did.

Since then she began having friendly walks, then friendly dinners , then parties. She had offered you to come sleep with her at his place , this man seemed to have been in the same high school you did back in the days.Today he was the kind of rich guy you overheard. He lives with his sister and they are trully going well together she had said.

You really wanted to ask more question about this Tom , but tonight you'll do it...Maybe.

Kate came back drunk at 2 AM , you were relieved and happy of your girlfriend she didn't spend the night with the other weirdo. What was this creep thining ?

Anyways, you had focused all the night to create a proper lie and said

"Hi honey ! I'm happy to see you ! " lacking energy , exhausted to have waited for her so late.

"Hey , I'm going to bed I'm out " she coughed while walking to the bedroom she then paused and added " By the way I'm a bit ill right now so please sleep on the sofa tonight"

Not wanting to piss her off before asking her to pay the rent you said

"Of course honey , whatever suits you! ". then added " You know I have something important to tell you."

"Oh really? " she said too drunk to stand up correctly, you saw she had a mark on her neck , you blushed terribly chocked from seeing that.

"Ye...Yeahs.. I ...I need your help to p..pay the rent"

"what happend ?" she dumbly asked

"Well I have found a new job but I have to move stuffs there so it takes time and ...."

You didn't understand why she chuckled.

"Wow ! Amazing " She said overironicly

"Why you lie ? You've been demoted to personal assistant I saw on your salary letter."

she then shook her head and added "Anyways , I accept but you don't have anyright to come in my room then until you get promoted back. "

you were really tortured by this deal , but judging by her look she would kick you out of her house if you don't work for it.

"O..Ok sweetie , as you wish !" you approched to her to kiss her goodnight but she stood till , your forehead barelyreached the bottom of her chest now , you truly were ridiculous next to such a beauty. She rose her hand and gestured you to kiss it , and you did it and submitedly said thank you , as her presence had overcrushed you tonight. She then went to bed and you heard her moan un her room later. She was probably having private fun session. It greatly drove you insane and you began jacking off , it seemed you'd not have sex for some time for now ....You heard as if she was speaking but could only hear mumble.You could at least have some satisfaction like that.

The next day , you shrunk again , you were 4'0, the quickest shrinking spurt you had since Lauren's promotion. You quickly stressed as you woke to late and had to rush in order to be in time.
Your girlfriend was on the phone with this Tom again. Her face seemed so bright , you hadn't seen her smile like that in a long time . At least she's happy to speak to him , he's probably just a friend. You forced your thoughts
she had finished eating and forgot to say goodbye when she left.
You almost left without taking your boss , Laurene's shoes back , she promised you there was no more chances.
Your fear of her increased 100 times when you saw your girlfriend had locked the door before leaving , letting you no other choice than confronting her.

124322.content:
Almost every day felt worst than the other, you had failed , again to please Laurene. This was a huge mistake.

"You know what , if you still want your place here I hope you'll learn your place at my feet twerp " She wrote a quick letter .

Coming home after a huge foot session with your former rival , now boss Laurene.


You opened the door to go to the restroom. you heard Kate speaking on stuff she judged sentimental shit probably on the phone and headed to the table , there was a few leters , one among them was sent today you looked at you mail, opening it froze your spine . You were demoted again ,to second class assistant. it were basically a role for a young teenager and consisted to get to help anyone who needed to. Oh gosh , the pay was only 235 $ a month , that was terrible. The worst was your girlfriend must have seen it since it was opened.

You then heard a loud suave voice of a male person from her room.

Surprised you went and knocked to the door. " Kate ? Can I come in ?"


" Jeez ..." you overheard then heard her head to the door. "What ?"She had a way more hard tone on you , since she was so tall for you it was kind of frightening.

she was there standing in her sport clotches , a guy appeared from behind her ,"Hi " he gently said , he seemed surprised to see someone , he was topless and really worked out . His face told you something ... You reckonized him ! Him and his sister were in the same highschool you went. They hated you and were always burying you around one way or another. Her sister was even more wicked that he is.

Fortunately you managed to make yourself small enough to not be focused by the guy. At first he acted decently to you but as the time passed the more he took confidence.

you served cookies and tea for the guest first , then went back in the kitchen to cook a full meal as your girlfriend and him sat on the table.
you tried to slip in during the meal but you were almost inexistant , they barely answered by a "hm" when you spoke while they didn't stop looking and speaking to each other. You saw her gently move her hand on his while speaking sexily , the cringe was too much for you,you prefered to leave.

The horror was when you prepared dessert you heard a moan ,in hurry you came back in the room ...He had done it , he had your girlfriend on his knees , frenchkissing passionately his lips , as he grabbed one of her boob she moaned again.

"Hey ! I've brought the desert !" You cut faking a smile.

Your girlfriend and Tom looked back at you.

"Wow nice!Thank you kiddo " He said.

"Yeah thank you " Added Kate , still on his lap , gently rubbing his pant.

Skipt to...

1243221.content:
You retreated in the kitchen to gather your thoughts..

Your girlfriend Kate had just made out with another guy she brought just in front of you . What was she planning ?

You had to have a serious talk to her.


This guy was the worst jerk you had met before. In high school him and his sister were always mocking you for being small or dumb. Judging his clothes he must have a pretty decent job now at least...You gathered all the strenght you had and headed back to the living room ,


Tom and Kate were on the couch , they were set in order to have Kate on Tom's lap while they were touching each others, as you arrived in front of them Kate finally spoke to you.

"Oh Rob , you forgot your heels in my room by the way ."

Tom didn't even look at you , he was too busy checking the tv and carressing Kate's legs.

You blushed and rather than explaining , you left to take Laurene's shoes back

12432211.content:
You cried on the couch the whole night because of what happened. Kate didn't hesitate to act when she found all the shoes in the room you guessed.
What was worst is that she laughed at you when you asked where were the bags now and said " I don't want any of your dirty stuff anywhere in my house ".

You were totally broken by this sad event , how will you live with her now ?


The worst was coming as you arrived at work, usually Laura , the receptionnist used to call you Mr Tyson before , but since you got demoted , she was one of a few people giving you attention at work , so you kinda got closer ,
"Hey Ron " She said with a bright smile.

"Hi Laura how are you ?" You asked , forcing you to smile was killing you , you really weren't in the mood.

"Great , Oh ! Mrs Lawson wanted me to remind you to bring her...hu...shoes *chuckles* in her office as soon as possible."

You were greatly embarrassed , what if Laurene told about your dirty work at your colleagues ? The situation wouldn't be great...

"Can you keep it in between us Laura ? " You said, looking at the floor shamed.

"But I was curious what is it about exactly ? You clean shoes or something ?" She asked curiously.

"Hm , I better go now , see you later." You quickly answered leaving.



Jeez , working as Laurene PA was so horrible , she had found a small desk she had set in the corner of her room where you have for only vision her while she meet people or work at her huge desk.


You sniked in your boss's office , " Hello Ma'am Lawson " You timidly said as you walked in without her bags.

"Well If it isn't my little personnal assistant " She said smiling and getting up to get near you. She was wearing pumps she bought three days ago , they were really classy yet huge 4 inches heels.
She stood next to you , hands on her sides while checking your height, your small 4'1" state looked ridiculous . You were trembling when you saw how huge she has gotten again. It was almost like everytime you see her , she grew taller.


After your quotidian measurement with Lauren , you knew she was 5'7 without any heels on , so she was basically 5'11" now. Your chin barely was higher than the upper part of her butt.

"Soon you'll be perfect size to give little kisses to my butt " She mocked grabbing your head to set it against her huge ass.

After laughing and keeping your position for a few seconds she let you go.

"So , where're my shoes twerp ?" Her look was serious, you learned how bad she could be when upset.

you felt your whole body getting cold and shaked before admiting the truth. You told her how bad it was at home and how your girlfriend cheated on you in front of your eyes to try and get her pity.

She was crazingly angry at you. Everybody heard when she yield how useless and incompetent you were. You spent the whole day undergoing huge pressures from her part , you had to buy all the shoes back for her, which meant going to the exact same store she went for all thoses twenty pairs of shoes she had. Fortunately she gave you a list of the brand so you could have time checking them during your breaks.

At midday you skipped lunching with Helen and Scott cause you were late in your work and just rushed to the nearby store to buy something for Laurene to eat . At least she had given you ten bucks so you coulld buy grab her food.

124322111.content:
You come home after another long day with Laurene to find your stuff in boxes in front of the house. Panicked you try your key to find the lock changed. You sigh and sit in front of the door for a little bit before you slowly start moving the boxes to your car. When your done you see Kate coming back to the house so you go to try to plea with her. She simply shoves you out of the way like your trash in front of her place.

So you leave the place probably for the last time and find a cheap hotel in the area and go to work the next day with all your stuff still in the car. You walk in not even trying to fake a smile and go to your desk in Laurene's office. Soon she enters and does her daily compare to find you now eye level with her butt. She tells you, "If you want to keep your job you better kiss my ass little man." so you do and your lack of hesitation confuses her so she asks what happened and you explain saying you can't afford a place to stay.

Laurene doesn't say much and lets you go most the day only doing the normal tasks that you should be doing but, she keeps smiling at you in a way that says she will make you her bitch. Then at the end of the day she tells you...

choices: Her closet , next to a pile of shoes
A dog bed next to her bed.
1243221111.content:
Laurene didn't talk to you too much , she was too busy on the phone .

Midday came and she asked you (more like ordered) to come eat with her, you felt ridiculous walking next to her in the street , you saw a group of young girls walking by pointing their fingers at you and laughing at how small you looked next to Laurene. She even had the nerve to ask you to give her your hand so you'd look even more childish.
The problem was your clothes had outgrew you and you didn't have enough money to buy new ones since you had spend the rest of your money buying Laurene's shoes because of your ex girlfriend...
You were totally broke right now and wondered how will you sleep tonight.

Laurene brought you to a restaurant. You couldn't resist staring at her huge ass as it was eye level with you. The waitress guided both of you to a table and your face turned white when you saw the price of the plates.

Even basic fries costed 15 bucks. It was more than expensive .

Laurene without even consulting you called the waitress.

"I'll take a Rumsteak and give him a child menu."

"Sure Madam " Said the blonde waitress before leaving.


You were kinda relieved to see she had chosen a child menu , that was probably the only thing you could afford here.

"So tell me freak , you have a place to stay tonight ?" Said your gigantic former rival

"Hm , I'm not sure , I think I'll stay in my car until I find a place to live.."

"I'm sorry but I won't accept having an homeless person working for me. You'll stink my whole office." She fermly told you.

"Wh.. But ...But I need time to find a place , I'm in a really complicated situation now Ma'am ! Please!" A few weeks ago you'd have enough dignity to not beg Laurene for anything but right now , she basically had your life in her hands.

"Hm , maybe we can find out something..." She said thinking.


You were kinda scared about what she was going to say next. You know way too well Laurene to not expect a wicked plan from her.

"Well , I have a deal for you. I can rent you a part of my place so you won't be homeless and you'll someone around to look after you if you shrink more" She winked , instead of interesting you , it made you shiver to think being one inch tall and around this bitch of a woman.

"Hm , No thanks Laurene I'm alright..." You mumbled.

"I think you didn't get it midget , it's either that or you stay in the street alone and die from hunger !" She angrily snorted.

You then finished your meal , you having huge difficulties to finish it while Laurene looks down on you ,waiting.

Later this day , she forced you to come with her by taking your hand and throwing you in her car.

"You shut up your mouth or I crush you under my butt " she scolded you while closing the door of the back right seat.

And that's how you arrived at her place, a tear in your eye thinking you get to live with your boss Laurene now. She had been mocking at you during the whole ride because she expected you to pay your whole salary as a rent , plus she was happy to finaly have a butler to take care of her place while she was too exhausted and busy to do it herself.

"Now shrimp let me show you where you'll sleep " She smirked evily, she opened the main door and guided you to.

12432211112.content:
She walks you to her bedroom and as you walk in you see a large dog bed placed at the foot of her bed. Seeing that bed was the last you can stand your position and you shout, "I'm not your pet Laurene I am still a person and I will not be treated like this." As you shout she calmly takes off her shoes and walks up to you. She stands next to you a turns around for a small comparison and finds you half way down her butt.

She smiles as she answers, "That fine you can leave if you want," she walks past you and sits on her bed. Face down you began to leave, "O" she cries. "I forgot to tell you I'm doing your evaluation for the quarter tomorrow so I should tell you there wouldn't be any reason for you to try to show up for work tomorrow." You turn around to see her grinning ear to ear as both of you knew if you lost this job none would hire you. You sit there for a moment stunned before walking back to her. She tells you it's not all bad she got you a gift that she left in a box on the dresser.

You go get it and open the box to find a dog collar that says "Laurene's bitch." She tells you to come over so she can put it on and you quietly and slowly listen. When she is done putting it on she grabs you hard by the balls and pulls you in. "If you ever raise your voice to me again I'll crush your balls, do you understand me." Your eyes start to water as you shake your head in agreement. She lets go satisfied with your response and you both go to bed for the night.

124322111121.content:
Ron was lying in his dog bed next to laurene's huge bed. He couldn't even see her from where he lied. She had placed his bed right at the end left side of hers. Next to her slippers. Ron felt tears forming in his eyes while he thought of his future if he stay here.

It was so uncomfortable he couldn't find sleep. The poor man even missed sleeping on Kate's couch now. Since he was awake he evaluated his options. Staying with Laurene couldn't be good. His boss already had crushed all his will in a matter of seconds.

His options were limited , and both would have critical consequences. First one was leaving. If he left his new place he could still live in his car until he gets too small. The problem was he didn't have any money anymore so he couldn't even pay fuel for his car, or even worst , to buy food.
The second was unthinkable, Ron tried not to think too much about it. He could stay like a good dog here and try to please his former rival to be fed and housed by her. It was destroying him thinking being at her feet and so much dependant of her.

The next morning the small man was woken up by Laurene's foot lightly kicking his weak body.

"Hey bitch, wake up !" She ordered , still sitting on her bed.

Ron woke up , lost until he realised the huge foot resting on his back and pushing him around.
He stood up to look at his boss. Laurene was still towering over his 3'7" puny height, she smirked while passing her hands in her long brown hair.
She was kind of hot Ron thought while seeing her only dressed with a panty and a bra.

"Slept well shrimp ?" She said looking down on him, her vicious dominating smile felt heavily humiliating for the weak man.

"Yes.." He answered frowning, she was truly despicable

Laurene saw his frowning face , she immediatly switched her tone to a more patronishing one.

"Hey , quite that look of yours. You should be gratefull to have a boss like me. Else you'd be living in a dumpster. Do you want to live in a dumpster bitch ?"

Picturing that , Ron felt shiver down his spine. He immediatly lowered his head and apologized to his boss.

"I'm sorry Laurene." He said with a scared trembling voice.

"give me my slippers now." She just answered . Ron kneeled to put her slippers on her big feet. He saw she had black nail polish and kinda had a well curved foot with long toes. Her feet seemed to be pretty well being take care of. It had no calluses and her white sole was really soft.

"I'm gonna take a shower now. So you'll get breakfast ready before I'm finished ."

Ron just had the time to shook his head in agreement that Laurene stood up, by stepping outside the bedroom she walked on his bed . She was trully not respecting him he thought. Maybe he should have been more kind with her when he was normal size. She surely wouldn't have been so mean to him if they didn't use to be rivals.

She had a pretty decent flat for a single woman. About an hundred square meters for herself may be pretty costy.

Ron prepared pancakes and poured orange juice for Laurene and himself.

He sat at the table waiting his boss to eat.
Laurene came back after ten minutes of wait. She was already dressed up for work , but kept her slippers for now.

Laurene stood still looking at the little man. "Silly silly boy. That's not where you're expecting to eat. She then took Ron's plate away and poored the food in a small cup. She then turned back to him.
"You're expected to eat down on the floor , and not with your hands. Just eat like the good puppy you are."

Ron felt totally humiliated. He was expected to eat just next to Laurene's filthy feet ?! In a dog cup ?! The dog collar she forced him to wear was hurting so much too. Everything was for the worst.
The human pet thought about all those facts for a second and ...

1243221111211.content:
You looked at Laurene for a moment stunned at how bad she was treating you. It was enough to make you want to wake away but in the end you knew what she told you yesterday was right if you didn't keep her happy no other job would want to hire you and that leaves no where for you to go. You sign then get out of your chair, get on your knees, and start to eat from the dog bowl while Laurene watched. Then as you eat your meal Laurene shoves your face into your food as she continues to eat. In a few mins she stops eating to tease you for a bit.

"Wow and to think a short while ago you were considered to be on par with me and now you are at the mercy of my foot." She smiles to her self for a moment, "You know this is a good visualization. You are a basic employee and the smaller you get the higher up the ladder I go and by the time I run the company you will just be a little speck in my hand." She grinds her foot on you a little before finally letting you up so you can eat. She shouts that you need to eat quickly so you can get ready and you obey the best you can.

Then she gives you permission to shower and get dressed and you quickly do so to barely make it outside in time for her to leave. You open the passenger door for her to quickly point you to a booster seat in the back. With no dignity left you obey. When you are at work she mainly has you do paper delivery's to peoples desks. You quickly find that Laurene must have sent out a memo because everyone responded by petting you and saying things like, "Thanks boy" or "good boy." You haven't really seen Helen recently but, today you did she her leave the break room to purposely avoid you. At the end of the day as Laurene gets ready to go you come up to her and see she has a dog lease.
1243221111211.title: Comply and eat at Laurene's feet like a dog.

choices: Helen sides with her boss
Helen sides with you
12432211112111.content:
No, it was too much , you couldn't fall so down . If your image was kinda bad right now in the office, doing that would put it even lower. There were still people around here and seeing you walking with Laurene , following her thanks to a lease would even lower it drastically.


"No Laurene, I don't want that." You said , looking way up to the giantess 5'8" tall woman.

Your head was just reaching her navel now and with your clothes too big for you it looked kinda pathetic.

"What's the matter shrimp ? Have you grown yourself some balls ?" She said in a scolding tone. Laurene was so huge and intimidating you hesitated before keeping on speaking.

"N...Not here not now please, I'd rather go live in a street than being treated like a dog."

Laurene thought for a while , you trully hated when she went suddenly silent and looks in the air while tapping her index on her chin. She was always planning something when doing that.

"Ok , I won't put that lease on then."

You were relieved at first , but she continued.

"But if you want to live in my place, there is no way you keep disagree with me. I might just kick you out then ... I must admit bullying your pathetic ass is becoming old now..."

What just said Laurene made you shiver. You thought again your posibilities and felt like you still needed her help for now.

She handed you her suitcase for you to carry then added. "I think if you want to stay around me , we have to sign an official contract...I'll ask my lawer about that..."

You then followed her by stepping right behind her like a good boy. You couldn't help but stare at her huge sexy ass, in her dress , even if you hated admiting it, you couldn't help but admit Laurene looked pretty gorgeous now. You still had thought of her in her bra and panties, reveling her female silhouette.

A boner was forming. Probably since it has been two weeks since you've had anything related to sex it was harder to resist.

Laurene suddenly stopped and your head bumped right in her pretty ass.

"Hey , care down here !" She scolded you .

"S...Sorry Laurene I wasn't looking and..."

"That's ok.." She just said pushly before turning to another person. You only saw the legs of this person.

"Hey Helen that's great we meet again , I signed your papers as you asked me. " She then said to the other giant woman. You stepped aside to have a better look to see your former office friend Helen. It was surprising to see how huge she was to you now. The last time you talked to her this 5'6" woman was just a few inches taller. Now you were 4'6" the height difference was drastic. Your forehead didn't even reach her breast now.


Before you could greet her Laurene snapped her fingers ." Hey , wake up hurry up ! Open the suitcase !" The dominating brunette ordered you.

You opened it and gave Helen's file to your boss.

"Good boy. " Laurene said , lifting it from your hands and handing it to her colleague.

You stared awkwardly into Helen's eyes, you couldn't tell if it was a pityfull look , or a disgusted one in her eyes. You hesitantly but finally talked

"Hi Helen ..."
12432211112111.title: You finally stand up for yourself

something else
124322111121111.content:
Laurene quickly interrupts telling you that you’re not being addressed and Helen laughs quietly before suggesting that her "dog" may need obedience training. Both girls burst out laughing and all you can do is hang your head. To make things worse the noise attracted Laura over. Since you last saw her you heard she got your old job and was doing a phenomenal job. When she sees you she stops for a sec before asking Laurene if you still worked here.

Then Laurene admits that you were supposed to be fired but she agree to let her lucky charm get paid by skimming it off her yearly bonus. You look at her amazed that 1. She would take a pay cut to keep you working for her. And 2. That the woman who was once your rival now makes more for her bonus then you are worth to the company.

Still in a joking mood Helen leans down to tell you how ungrateful you are. Then your eyes start to tear up from the fact that your “master” seems to be the only person who actually has any interest your survival. You turn towards Laurene and soft say “I’m sorry.” Laurene smiles and informs everyone, “Looks like the dog can learn.” Then she turns her hip towards you, “Since you finally see your place under me why don’t you kiss my ass?”

Helen and Laura lean in to see if you will do it and you…

Two weeks had past and it has been clear for about 12 days that you are clearly shrinking and it is either speeding up or the stress with both Laney and Laurene both supervising you for the last week since Laurene's promotion is speeding it up. The first week of shrinking ends with you about 5' 4" and now your 5'.

Both supervisors have been making it a habit of coming by to compare sizes, give you any extra work they don't want to do, and belittle you whenever possible. Towards the end of the day a meeting is called (almost out of nowhere) infront of Laney's office.
The meeting is to tell everyone that Laura, the blond tall receiptionist will be the company's next sales rep and she will...

1253.content:
Laura became the companies youngest sales rep and was placed directly under you. You felt very relieved at the news cause you figured she would be a big help and be able to lift most of your burden from you, And for the 1st two weeks you were right she followed your lead and advise, did most of the paperwork, and listened quietly as you met with clients. Then after those two weeks, when you were about 4'8" a potential client decided to mock you about how your company sent someone of such small standing. Laura quickly stepped in on your defense and quickly won over the client. From there things still went well with Laura and you changing into a partnership instead of teacher/student.

Then a week later at 4'5" your size made you unable to be ready on time and missed two morning meetings.When you arrived you find out Laura had both meeting and they turned out better than expected which put her in the leader position. Soon you started being removed from the meeting altogether and sent out to get the paperwork or just her cup of coffee it even got to her making you polish her shoes for her to meet with your old clients. You became Laura's PA in every way except title then...
1253.title: Day 31  Laura's first steps as a a sales rep

choices: Day 44  4'1 Laura's promotion , your demotion
Day 42 at 4'3" Mrs Laney comes in while you are giving Laura a foot rub
12531.content:
It was increadible to see how efficient she was , in no time her performances overwhelmed your puny ones. She was so bright that soon people spoke more with her than with you.

She was so gentle at first but since a few days you saw the situation switched as she had more responsibility, appeared to even outskilled you plus was the one in relation with the leadership. You deeply regreted crossing Laney, it appeared you had lost any credibility to her now, a few days ago she asked you about topics you had no clue since it was Laura's job and saw the disappoitment in her eyes. You are since that day evicted from conferences but still asks Laura how it was when she comes from reunion.

You ate with Helen a few days ago, and she confided to you Alison planned in offering your post to Laura and kick you out, you barely slept imagining revealing your girlfriend you had no job anymore and probably won't have another one with your current height.
Hearing the news you couldn't help but act the best with Laura, offering her to fetch coffee or if there was anything you could help with but she appeared rather dismissive or doubting about the possibility you could help her, since any sales question she asked you had proved to have no correct answer on your part.

And there you were, day 37, arriving 30 minutes late at work at 4'5" having barely slept. You sneaked in the worspace only the two of you were placed and knowing she was at reunion. However, Laura was still at her desk looking at you with a quizzical eye. "Hi Laura, sorry being late, had a problem at home.".
"Hello, hm you might want to keep it for Laney as she just came here 5 minutes ago. She wants to talk to you."
Knowing how to well Laney wanted to kick you out you had to ask Laura for help one more time!
"Can I help you with anything Laura?" You asked bringing her her favorite Mocca cofee but she said no. You stayed at your desk only to see all your files had been moved to Laura and your session was locked so after around 30 minutes of trying you came back to Laura and asked if you could work on a file for her but once again she said she prefered getting the job well done by herself.

You bit your lips and looked down knowing you hadn't proved to be very efficient these last days but were cut in your thoughts as she settled one of her nylon pumped leg on her desk. "However, I think you can help me. I'll have a presentation in around an hour and have to be my feet rubbed to release the stress, would you be able to help me?"
You didn't hesitate and said sure. Feeling a bit belittled to be used in such a way. Once you were done massaging Laura thanked you and even once in a while, mostly by the end of the day asked you to give her a foot rub. You realised it was really effective to her not be pissed at you and decided to study on this field only to have your girlfriend finding you were interrested in foot massages, making two persons daily asking you for ones now.
12531.title: Day 39 Laura gets meaner

choices: Day 48: 3'5"  Laurene heard about your efficient foot habilities
Day 50: 3'45" New place at Laura's desk, under her feet.
125311.content:
As the promotion reunion was occuring ,Ron clapped his hands, standing next to Laura, the height difference was even more enhanced thanks to her heels.

Mrs Laney was speaking at the micro on a small scene "Thanks, all of you, we proved to be very efficient this semestre and reach a tremendous sell rate."
She Spoke about the evolution of the company, but the moment everyone wanted to hear was the promotions. It has been said that Mrs.Laney had been promoted and wanted to put someone else in charge here.

"Come over here Laurene." She then said to your rival. For once everyone's attention wasn't made for making fun of you.

....


Ron had a glimpse, trying to have a vision between his gigantic colleagues, of Laurene, perfectly makeuped in her fancy dress. He saw this bitch of a woman walking proudly to the scene.

"She doesn't deserve this !" Snorted the small man .
He looked up to Laura, she seemed very interrested in the event. She probably was a shark like co-worker , totally focused on climbing the ladder of the corporation.

Laurene took the micro.

"Well , I wanted to thank you all for the hard work , Huu, I'm a bit confused, this is such an honor !"

"Pfff I should be the one here" He jealously said, Ron then grabbed Laura's robe and pulled it to have her attention.

"What ? I'm listening Rony!", Rony was the surname she recently gave him.

"Laura , I have to go away ."

"Fine , do whatever you want" She said in a uncaring way before turning back to Laurene's speech.

He was so small he could easily make his way around people.Ron headed towards the buffet and began eating various plate on it.

Laurene was feeling strong, victorious, she had worked so hard to get there. She was truly relieved to see her rival slowly shrinking away when it was time to make prooves.
Her thoughts then turned towards him.

"I really wanted to thank the duo Laura and her tutor, Ron !...Come over here don't be shy."

Laura stepped , surprised to have been mentioned, she made her way to Laurene.
"Where's Ron ?" She said checking the area .

"Ron ? You there ?" Said your giant promoted rival.

Calling you like that made her think of a joke she couldn't resist to make
"Can everyone look under its shoes ?" The worst was everyone was laughing.

A red haired girl that Ron didn't know grabbed his shoulder , maybe she was a bit tipsy but her grab hurted pretty bad.

"He's here !" She said happily.

Laurene then said in a babyishing way "Aww there you are little man , I didn't see you, come over here !"
The reduced Ron timidly stepped looking at his colleagues that smirked at him, He saw Helene laughing when a random other person made what seemed to be a joke.

You and Laura were standing face to Laurene and Mrs Laney.

Laurene spoke. "Laura, we already told about it so I'll make it quick, we've decided that you were to take Ron's office and replace him since he no longer suits the job. "

"Oh god ! I'll Do my best thank you" Laura was almost crying in tears.

The ridiculous Ron looked up to his former rival, now boss with what was left of your courage. She was so gigantic now, her barely reached her navel .The saler saw her huge sluty face looking down at him and smirking.She even had to bent to have a proper sight of him. Just looking at her made the small man's stomach rumble weirdly.

"Well Ron, I wanted to congratulate you for your hard working in the company." She said slowly.

Ron had heard rumors that they were planning to fire him since he did awful results, and it was getting even worst everyday. Ron looked at Laurene pleadingly. Doing so he felt a weird feeling he had preceding a shrinking spurt, the problem was it was like...Growing, bigger as he felt more humilitated. It was getting really hard to resist now.

"Since you had been someone hard worker in the past, and since I'm such a good boss, I'll annonce you we found you a new job !"

She paused a second , the small Ron was terrified and devastated, he felt like he had to let it go and shrink as it was getting too overwhelming to resist the shrinking.


"We have decided to make you , Laura's official assistant, you can thank her because she really insisted for it!" She said it and everyone turned their attention at the new assistant as he bent a little from a thing he couldn't hold.

He slowly began to shrink unstopably. When Ron began able to go back to his feet he saw what was happening. "N..No..." He looked at everyone fixing him silently. Ron looked up, Laurene seemed marveled by that, she was bitting her lips from exitment probably. Laura also seemed deeply analyzing what was going on, even Laney was stepping closer to have a view. He saw their faces slowly going higher, as their whole body increased in size slowly .

His thoughts came back of the horrifying moments he was just living and he felt an enhancement even higher of the shrinking spurt.He slowly stopped at 3'6" while Laurene had followed his shrinking making a " pewwww" sound for it. She pressed her finger on the small demoted man's head . "Oh . It has stopped.... So what do you say Ron ?"

Laurene really didn't let him any time for him.


"Wh..What do you want me to say ? " He tried to say defiantly while standing now as tall as one of her leg.

Laurene took a step to him and stopped so close that she had to look all the way down to see him. It was trully intimidating for the small man.
"And how about , Thanks ?" She sternly looked at him.


The small man let go all his proud aside and accepted the truth, it was hard keeping a rival relation with her. It was so annoying to picture her as his boss now. "

"Th...Thanks boss..." He mumbled .

"Oh , No , I'm not reaally your boss.... You know, Laura is your boss now, I'm more like the boss of your boss. Wow , that sounds a bit downgrading , sorry about that."

That was the last time you had Laurene's attention, she then went to party with her closest colleagues while Laura scolded you for being such an awkward person.
Both Ron and her were at the buffet right now, eating. "Hu... You're so awkward ! You've humiliated us !"

"B..But , Laura , you've been promoted and..."

"Yeah , and you demoted , so try to call me by my firstname again and I get you right out the street got it ?" Laura looked really pissed of you.

The fact she was his direct superior now made Ron think straight . He couldn't risk to lose the job , what would Kate think if he does.
"Sure boss ! Sorry!" He tried to be fun and bent in order to show his appologises but his hand knoked The Giantess Laura's hand and made fall a food right on her heel.

"Fuck ! Look at what you've done twerp !"

"Uhh!! Sorry boss !" Ron rushed around but found nothing to clean her shoe of , he then went on his knees and rubbed with his cloth the creme off her foot.

Just in that time Helen , his former friend came in, he was not used to see her dressed up, but she was pretty in this suit.

"wow , you've really have fallen down Ron." She said when you raised up to say hi.

"Ha ha , yeah, I just poured something on Laur....my boss's shoes so I wanted to clean it." Ron tried to fake a smile and at least was satisfied to hear her laugh.

"Oh god, yeah that's normal Ron. Way to go !" She said , before turning her attention to Laura

"Congratulation for your promotion , I'm sure we'll work well together !" She continued.

Ron thought if Laura was his boss now, What would that make Helen to him ? He realised it was stupid thinking about that. The post was created just to keep him around. The small man still hopped that Laura could help him and eventually tell Laurene he has improved, that it would eventually make him promoted back ?

He looked at all the other persons, that were having fun while he followed his new boss around like a dog while she was congratulated by everyone.
125311.title: Day 44  4'1 Laura's promotion , your de...

choices: At home, Kate wants to talk.
Fast forward three weeks; Laney's demoting you to PA, 3'11"
Fast forward two weeks; drinks with Helen, 4'2"
Fast forward two months; Laney has taken you home, 2'11"
Fast forward two years; You're stranded at work, 1"
13.content:
Kate woke you up. It was a favor since she didn't have to be up herself another couple hours, but, she'd largely taken on your burdens in addition to your own, so while clearly unhappy to have gotten so little sleep, she was also kind of used to it. She poured two bowls of cereal for your breakfast, you getting the smaller bowl, and you sat around the table eating quietly. As she was done, without noticing you had a couple spoonfuls left, she said "let's get your daily measurement" and went to the ruler you'd pasted onto the wall. Standing next to each other you looked ahead at Kate's chin as she marked your new height off with a marker. "You're just barely over 4'7" today, honey, the shrinking may be slowing down yet" she said with a smile.

You hoped so too. Anyway, you got into your work clothes (the manliest extra-small pantsuit Kate could buy with her employee discount), got in the car, and went to work. You were of course sitting on all your phonebooks; you hoped you really did stop shrinking soon so that you could at least keep driving if nothing else. You were a couple minutes late, but it was easy to slip in now you were getting smaller. You checked your email. One message, from Mrs. Laney. "Be in my office at 9 sharp." Damnit.

You walked over, this time waving to Laura, and gently opened the door to Laney's office. "Yes Mrs. Laney?" You asked, a little timidly. "Come in, shut the door behind you," she said. You did so, then sat in a chair across the desk from her. Your feet barely touched the ground.

"You were late again this morning, runt, and don't think just because you're shrinking I don't expect the same results out of you." What a bitch! You were late, and it wasn't the first time, but considering, -

"Do you understand?" "Of course Mrs. Laney." "Good. Stand up, come over to this side, I want to see something." You did as told; Laney pushed out from her desk and stood up next to you. With her heels she was over a foot taller than you, and her grin indicated that she loved it. "That's all I needed," she said, but as she sat back down she knocked a pen off her desk. "Will you pick that up for me?" You quickly got on your hands and knees to look for it, since you didn't want to invite the comparison that she was almost taller now sitting down.

Laney had always been aggressive but she'd taken a special liking to lording over you; last week she was talking about making you her personal assistant, since soon your stature would make meeting with clients impractical, and she still wanted you to be "useful." When you spotted the pen under her desk, you leaned forward, grabbed it, and stopped when you felt a heeled pump shoe land deliberately on your back.

"Oh, I'm just seeing if you'll make a good footrest. You have a little more shrinking to do little man." Laney almost cackled. Then there was silence; you were so embarassed that you didn't dare turn your head upward to see her domineering gaze. For about ten seconds you just felt her leg balance on your back.

A knock at the door saved you. "Get up," she said, putting her foot down right under your head. You carefully crawled back out so as not to hit your head and handed her the pen. "Quarterly is due next Friday," Laney reminded you, "and you have a lot of work to do to catch up to your quota." Really!? You'd been at the doctors for nearly a week trying to figure this whole shrinking thing out! Not to mention more and more of your work time was sacrificed to head games under Laney.

"I know Mrs. Laney, I'll make it." What else could you say? She told the knocker, another manager from a different department, to come in, and the visitor looked down and smiled at you on your way out. It seemed everyone was looking down at you by now.

Fortunately the rest of the day went without much more human interaction; your confidence shaken, you chose to work through a pile of paperwork you'd been building up instead of making any of the calls that you needed. Helen noticed you were gloomy and tried to cheer you up with a cookie at lunch, but other than that, you avoided everyone until 5, and in fact stayed over a little longer to avoid having to say bye on your way out. This meant you walked out behind Laura. Your new height gave you a great view of her ass swaying; that actually made you pretty cheery up until you got to your car and saw the phonebooks again, a reminder of your unfortunate circumstance.
13.title: 31 Days - You're the office runt - 4'7".

131.content:
When you get home Kate is already there which is very odd with the differences you both have in schedules. She stayed seated in her chair as you came in, that became normal for both of you to talk because the height difference when she stands. She tells you that she was promoted at her job and will soon be making about as much as both of you combined used to make but to do that she will need to travel for extended periods of time. The two of you talked about it for a couple of days and agreed to move into a three bedroom house and will hire a caretaker to help you when Kate is away.

Kate ends up giving the job to her niece Alice a blond 22 year old who just got a business degree and is looking for work in your field. Alice is 6' and athletic one of those's people who always seem to do everything right without trying. When you and Kate move Alice gets one of the guest rooms and makes sure you get were you need to be on time. Then Kate goes on her first business trip when you're about 4' 5" tall..
131.title: Day 31 At home, Kate wants to talk.

You try to resist her
1311.content:
Kate is all packed and ready to leave that Saturday night which allows her to set up her presentation all day Sunday to show the clients on Monday, this means it will be your first weekend alone with Alice. Alice is away at the gym as Kate and you say your good-byes she leaves on a taxi to go to the airport and you wave to her as you watch the car turn the corner the last time you will see her till Friday night. You go back inside and start dinner for Alice and you hear the garage opening meaning Alice is back. She comes in wearing a black sports bra with a yellow strip and yoga pants. She comes in both of you eat Alice asks if everything went well with Kate's send off .You could clearly see she had a kind of flirty voice but couldn't see anything as she neither acted straight plus is rather of a top model kind.

Then after dinner after you put the dishes in the sink you turn around to see Alicewith her legs widened to put you at her boob level. Before you can even react she squeezes you tight against her body. You try to resist to be met with a small laugh. Then she stands up straight forcing you to dangle as she holds you up. She carries you into the living room to toss you down on the floor as you crawl to put some distance between you she sits down.

She crosses her legs then with a smile she says, "You better start licking my shoes or I'm really going to kick you ass little man."
1311.title: Day 34 at 4'3" Alice runs the house.

You wake up at 4'4"
13111.content:
Alice is more then 1' and a half taller then you so without a fight you crawl over and start licking her running shoes. You don't look up but you can feel the dominance in her stare as you clean her shoes. When you finish you look down at the ground to belittled to look at her.

When your head is down Alice puts her foot on your head saying, "Come on lillte Ronny how pathetic can you be." "I clearly gave you too much credit calling you "little man" you're a poor excuse for a boy."

You just sit there doing nothing but emotionally feel like a pebble being held down by a mountain. When she takes her foot off you she lays down on the couch before Alice tells you to clean the house and that she better not see you again tonight. You do as your told and go to bed feeling like a little bug...

132.content:
The day was coming and you knew it as you struggled in a losing battle to get your work done. Laney goes to your desk as she does each day now, usually she just comes for a quick power trip, but you know any day now that demotion is coming. Mrs. Laney leans over your desk which puts her breasts at your eye level she stands there with a wicked grin then tells you to stand up. You sigh as you hop out of your of your seat making you 2 in. smaller.

She then pats your head as she starts the belittlement, "Good little boy you always work so hard to get your work done. But, unfortunately this job needs employees that can measure up to the company standard and you have done little more then fall short the last few weeks."

Then she gets to what she really wants to say as she explains, "Lucky for you I talked to the higher ups and convinced them to offer you a job as my assistant. It will pay a lot less but, in your situation I suggest not leaving here jobless cause I doubt many companies hire shrinking little boys."Knowing she is right you agree and follow her to your new desk which you find out is a standing desk set to 5'.

"My last assistant was a little on the short side so if you need to adjust the height the button is on the far right side," Laney explains before leaving you to move your supplies over telling you she will need you in her office at 4:55. So...

1321.content:
Laney gave you your new job so you start moving things from your old desk to the floor under your new desk planning to get your chair to use as a boost to get to the switch on the desk. When you are done moving the boxes though you are greeted by Julie a friend of Laney who sometime sneaks over from her department. Julie was 5' 10" with long black hair with the bightest teeth and she enjoyed toying with you almost as much as Laney does. She raises your desk to rest her elbow on it as she tells you, "Laney told me she was getting a cute little assistant today hope you live up to her high standers."

She then walks through you knocking you over as she goes into Laney's office leaving your desk in its new higher position. You get back to moving and get the desk lowered to find that it's lowest position is at your chest when you're standing so you kept your chair in order to reach. Then around 4:50 you head into Laney's office and...
1321.title: Someone comes in

choices: You have pleased Laney, she doesn't reveal your position to her friend
Julie finds you under the desk
13211.content:
Seing it was almost time to leave you thought it would give you some points to say goodbye to your boss.

Not only you felt ridicule having a desk way too high for you but also every coworkers that walked by made you feel like it. You only wished to be back home with Kate, at least she always felt supportive and is nice with you.

You enter Laney's room after shyly knocking on the door. "Hello Mrs Laney, I wondered if you needed something before I go?"

She didn't move her eyes out of her laptop and waved at you to come.

"Yes, is there anything I can help you with m'am?" You asked worried.

"Yes Ron, I've got a reunion call tonight and it might be really stressfull so I thought you could work for your paycheck and stay for a while?"

It didn't please you to stay after your due time, but it was your direct boss that has asked you so you might not have a choice.

"Ok sure I'll stay for a while." You casually said sitting on a chair.

"Ha ha, No Ron that chair is for Julie, she's coming with us. You are supposed to sit here." Laney pointed under her chair.

Laney grabbed your arm and almost forced you to be under her desk. "Good, now you don't move or say a word boy." She casually said as you saw her two long black nyloned soles landing on your face and torso.
And so you stayed, forced to smell her feet after a long day of work.

The worst was when the door opened, you reconized Julie's voice, and even saw her shoes from the other side of the desk. You choose to rub Laney's feet in a prayer not to be denounced.
13211.title: preparation of a conference

135.content:
You sit there on the desk waiting for your ride you start to worry because when the meetings go this late sometimes she walks out with everyone else then isn't let back into the office. In the morning she comes to get you but it's a reminder that now at this size your more of an item then a person. You think back to the proccess of first losing clients because your small stature to becoming Mrs. Laney PA at the size of 3'.

Then you got fired when you became 2' because not even Mrs. Laney could find an excuse to keep you other then for her amusement. Then when you became 1' 6" your girlfriend kicked you out because she wanted a relationship not "a pet" to take care of. Which she actually did keep helping you. You lived in your car parked in a business structure and she came by about once a week give you some non-perishable to eat.

Then around 1' tall one day Mrs. Laney came by and offered you a deal. You where to become her pet and do whatever she said and you got a home and hot food. That was months ago and because of the deal the world thinks your dead because your master Alison Laney secretly took out a life insurance policy when you became her PA. So one car off the cliff later she richer then ever before and she has one of a kind pet.

Alison walks in around this time and she sits on the desk next to you. "Ready to go bug boy," she asks as she knocks you over with her finger. Without getting an answer she picks you up and places you in her purse.
135.title: Y2 Day 31 Strandled at work

choices: Meeting Dr. Lisa on Day 10 - 5'3"
Watching a movie at home with Kate on Day 25 - 4'9"
Back at the doctors on Day 60 - 3'8"
At the doctors after an incident on Day 259 - 11"
Captured by sorority girls on Day 322 - 7"
14.content:
Oh God, things had been so horrible over the past week, you were worried sick, but finally being at the doctor's was calming your nerves. Kate, and everyone at work, had pretended to be supportive during this mysterious shrinking illness, but you had begun to feel a little invisible to the world. Did short people feel like this all the time? You pondered for a bit when Dr. Marquez opened the door.

"Hola Ron, now I understand that you have this very unusual condition; please tell me everything you can."

"Well...I've been shrinking; I didn't notice until Sunday; so far I've lost about four inches. I haven't had much of an appetite - I've barely been able to keep anything down in fact."

"How much have you eaten this week?"

"I tried to force myself Tuesday but I threw up after I had a hamburger. I've just had water and toast in the mornings."

"Well...when you called in and said that you were shrinking I honestly didn't believe you but your symptoms line up with a disease that we previously thought was just an old Mexican myth. You will forgive me for being almost excited about your case, but we may learn very much about the human body from your condition. I did make contact with a researcher at Capital Hospital. She'll be wanting to talk to you since you have definitely verifiably shrunk."

"Am I going to be lab rat?" You shuddered. What if it never ended? You might literally be a lab rat, in size anyway, in a matter of days. It felt that way. Calm down, you thought to yourself.

Dr. Marquez did her best to assuage your apprehension. "No no, Ron, of course not. You'll certainly have informed consent at every stage of the process, even if you one day fit in my hand, hehe." You didn't laugh. She continued: "But of course we expect to reverse this long before that point. Dr. Lisa believes you're suffering from an unknown interaction of digestive and hormonal disorders. It should be possible for us to fix and maybe even reverse your height loss, even if it means regular injections or diet restrictions. For a few weeks however we need to simply monitor your condition and make sure we have the problem figured out, before we start interfering in your body's process."

It's okay, Ron, you thought to yourself. Only a few weeks. Then it'll all get better. You may even become a star! However at the moment you didn't want to face anyone, much less the whole world. But this won't be so bad in the meantime. You'll be watched closely and probably only lose another couple inches. Right?

"I see no reason for us to need to keep you under observation," Dr. Marquez went on, "since you seem to be only gradually changing and not having any other difficulties. We would like you to stick to a strict water-only diet, record your height every eight hours, and come in every Monday and Thursday for blood work. Here's Dr. Lisa's card; she has graciously agreed to support you with a stipend for new clothes, but she wants you to continue going to work and change your routine as little as possible. Sometimes disorders are brought on by stress and any large changes may aggravate your condition."

As if this could possibly be unstressful. But you couldn't complain too much. You stood up to thank Dr. Marquez and shake her hand, and discovered that now you had to look slightly up to her. On your way out you did manage to feel optimistic as you set up appointments for the blood tests and with Dr. Lisa. Maybe things were going to be okay after all. Kate, who had been in the waiting room, lit up when she saw a smile on your face for the first time in almost a week. You hugged and walked out to her car together.
14.title: At the doctors

info.brief_description: Ron is slowly shrinking everyday his whole life changes because of it.
info.description:
As I found a story a while ago I thought how great the plot was, unfortunately the author appeared to be a ghost and never answered me neither interracted with my chapters so I've decided to publish it on my acc so I could keep updating the story.
https://www.writing.com/main/interact/item_id/1893505-Slowly-shrinking-away

Here's the plot:

Ron Tyson, junior sales clerk at Styro-Widgets Co., begins to shrink, but only to the tune of about 0.7% per day. Ron is in his twenties and shares an apartment with his girlfriend, Kate.

At 0.7%/day, Ron is 5'0" tall after 16 days; 4'0" tall after 49 days; 3'0" tall after 90 days; 2'0" tall after 148 days; 12 inches at 246 days; 8 inches at 304 days; 6 inches at 345 days; 4 inches at 403 days; 2 inches at 502 days; 1 inch at 600 days; 1 cm at 734 days; and 1 mm at 1085 days.

Feel free to skip forward/backward in time, just keep the plot consistent within that branch. Across branches doesn't matter as much.

Ron's condition is incurable but he doesn't know that. He may acquire other conditions (indestructible, malleable, etc.) as are convenient to the story.

Limited male interaction, please. Friendly women welcome, but, Ron should have a preponderance of dominating women in his life.

Otherwise, almost anything goes.
